entries.content: Magic in this world is channeled through crystals that glow when touched by those with the gift. Spells require both verbal incantations and precise hand gestures.
Eldoria is the great kingdom ruled by Queen Lysandra. The capital city is built on seven hills, with the Royal Palace at the highest point overlooking the harbor.
Shadowfyre is an ancient black dragon who has slumbered in the Whispering Mountains for three centuries. Legends say its awakening will herald the end of an age.
